title: Fathers
creator_credit: Antonio Colacino, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: Discusses the role of the father in contemporary society. Previously the daily care of children was seen to be the mother’s responsibility, but an increasing number of fathers are now taking the primary responsibility for the care of their children. This active involvement by both parents with their children, could benefit all family members.
